title: Start Small, Grow Steadily
content: Begin with what you have and expand gradually. Focus on consistency, not size. Small, reliable profits grow trust and sustainability.
author: Fatuma Ibrahim, Garissa

title: Record Every Transaction
content: Keep simple financial records for your daily sales and expenses. This helps you track growth and identify areas to improve.
author: Garissa Women Business Group

title: Leverage Mobile Money
content: Use M-Pesa and Till numbers to collect payments securely and maintain business transparency.
author: Halima Abdi, Entrepreneur

title: Collaborate with Others
content: Partner with other women to buy goods in bulk or share transport costs. Unity lowers costs and increases profit.
author: Wajir Women Traders

title: Advertise on WhatsApp
content: Use WhatsApp Status and groups to showcase your products. A photo and short caption can attract many customers.
author: Zainab Noor, Mandera
